quest.name: Julia
Abide by the Rules
quest.text: Before resuming your adventure and exploration, you will need to register on the boarding list of the ship, and to sign its rules.
Coordinates: La Johanne, First Deck. (27,24)

quest.name: Julia
Abide by the rules
quest.text: Rules:
1. Do not bot. This means are not allowed to run any automated or use keyboard tricks. Any away from keyboard activity will be considered as botting. This does not include standing still.
2. Do not spam. This also concerns trade spam.
3. Do not multibox. This mean you cannot have more than one active character logged in at a time. You are not allowed to use more than one active client at a time to attack in groups.
4. Do not trashtalk, beg or use rude language in your character name or in the chat, at the exception of roleplay purposes.
5. Do not speak any other language other than English in the public areas. You are free to speak any language you want in private chats, or when alone with friends.
6. Follow the social convention listed on the RFC1855 article.

quest.name: Magic Arpan
Speaking with Magic Arpan
quest.text: Magic Arpan is waiting for you. Go speak with him.
To speak to an NPC, click on him with your mouse or select him with then N key and then start to chat with him with the T key.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (39,33)

quest.name: Magic Arpan
Opening the Chest
quest.text: You need to open the chest and to take the clothes from it.
To perform this action, click on the chest with your mouse or select it with the N key and then interact with it using the T key.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (41,37)

quest.name: Magic Arpan
Equip an Item
quest.text: Open your inventory by using the F3 key or use your mouse to select it in the menu of your client.
Once your inventory is open, you may equip the item by selecting it and clicking 'Equip'. Alternately, you can take off an equipment by clicking on 'Unequip'.
Some items perform different effects. Some will heal you, some can be used as weapons or armors, and others can be sold for gold.

quest.name: Alige
Piberries Lover
quest.text: A mysterious voyager needs your help. He's hidden on the bottom level, on the reserve of the ship.
It seems to be an urgent task, but he's paranoid by the fact that you could be a sailor, stay on your guard!
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (33,31)

quest.name: Alige
Piberries Lover
quest.text: Alige, the mysterious voyager, is requesting your help to find some food.
He's actually hidding on a hole of the hallway, which conduct to the ship's hold where he got access to some barrel of piberries.
It seems that he's bored of eating all the time the same berries, so he's harboring you these berries against any other kind of food.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Second Deck. (33,31)
Difficulty: ✩✩✩✩✩✩
Reward: A handful of PiBerries.
